changelog.title: Trail Hunter System
changelog.description: Ethereal Patronus guides appear when you begin a hunt. Follow the White Rabbit to learn skills needed for Gate 1.

changelog.title: Patronus Animations
changelog.description: Magical creatures hop around screen edges, leaving sparkle trails. They react when you discover trail modules.

changelog.title: Gate Trail Guides
changelog.description: Stuck at a gate? Click 'Need Guidance' to start a hunt. You'll be directed to houses where trail markers await.

changelog.title: Hunt Progress Tracking
changelog.description: See your discovery progress in the corner. Find all trail modules to complete the hunt and unlock achievements.
